resources.string: 1) Select your name and your team
2) Shake your device to get started
3) The map will show your location as a blue dot and the buildings location as a red pointer
4) Your objective is to capture all the buildings before the other team in the time limit of a week
5) To capture a building, you need to be in the range of the building (radius of 50 meters)
6) Once you capture the building, it will turn into the color of your team, and it will be locked by a riddle so that the other team does not steal it easily
7) If you want to capture a building that is already captured by the other team, you will have to follow step 5, and solve a riddle
